goal: To protect yourself when working with primer, you can [SEP] solution 1Work with it in a well ventilated area [SEP] solution 2Work with it in a poorly ventilated area

goal: At what temperature should I bake the focaccia bread? [SEP] solution 1Bake the bread for 25 - 30 minutes in a 200 degree oven. [SEP] solution 2Bake the bread for 25 - 30 minutes in a 450 degree oven.

goal: How to made shield edges smooth. [SEP] solution 1Using paper, rub the paper along the edges of the shield until all edges are smooth and not sharp. [SEP] solution 2Using sand paper, rub the paper along the edges of the shield until all edges are smooth and not sharp.

goal: To dry potatoes after frying, [SEP] solution 1carefully remove the fried potatoes from the pan with a slotted spoon and set onto paper towels to drain until cooled. [SEP] solution 2carefully remove the fried potatoes from the pan with a tablespoon and set onto paper towels to drain until cooled.
